Product features

Slim Fit

The Charles Tyrwhitt Slim fit is trimmer at the waist, with slim sleeves and a more defined silhouette.

Read more

The Charles Tyrwhitt Slim fit is trimmer at the waist than the Classic fit, and has slim sleeves and a more defined silhouette. Back pleats enhance movement and comfort, while level shirt tails at the front and back mean you can wear this shirt tucked or untucked. This is our most standard fitting shirt, and it suits most shapes and sizes.

Cutaway collar

Our cutaway collar is wider than the classic collar, with tips that point outwards (not down) so more of your tie is visible.

Read more

Our cutaway collar is wider than the classic collar. The tips of each side of the collar point outwards (not down) so more of your tie is visible. This collar can be worn with or without a tie; however it looks best with larger tie knots such as the half or full Windsor knot.

Collar point: 7.8cm|Collar spread: 13.5cm

How To Measure For A Shirt

Getting the best fit is easy once you know some of your basic measurements. From collar size to sleeve length, we will take you through the measuring process in order to find that perfect Charles Tyrwhitt shirt.

Watch the video

The most important thing when choosing a shirt is to get the right fit. A great fitting shirt is gathered in all the right places to give you a smart look, a defined silhouette, and the confidence that comes from knowing you are impeccably dressed.

Product details

Product details

  • 100% cotton
  • Cutaway collar
  • Slim fit
  • Non-iron
  • Available in mitred single cuff with two-buttons or square double cuff
  • Complimentary brass collar stiffeners
  • Split back yoke and back pleats for an excellent fit
  • Machine washable

"There's no denying that men love a blue shirt. This new collection of textured shirts caters to that love with a variety of tactile designs that feel (and look) phenomenal. They are a deft example of the care and attention that goes into the craftsmanship of a Tyrwhitt shirt."
